title: The careles shepherdess a tragi-comedy acted before the King & Queen, and at Salisbury-Court, with great applause / written by T.G. ; with an alphebeticall catologue of all such plays that ever were printed.
author: Goffe, Thomas, 1591-1629.
publisher: Printed for Richard Rogers and William Ley, and are to be sould at Pauls Chaine ...,
notes: "An exact and perfect catologue of all playes that are printed": p. [1]-[6] at end.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
